Text.Page:
We got all this food prepared for the workers, but they're all too busy to come in and have a meal! They can't work on empty stomachs!

, I know it's not as exciting as what you usually do, but could you deliver this food to the workers?
Hey, I was just starting to get hungry! You must have read my mind. Or my stomach. Thanks! Bettenis could use some food, too.
What's that heavenly smell? Mmm...a hot meal delivered on site? Excellent. Thanks!
Oh this looks tasty! I just wish I didn't have this awful stomachache.
